Header.title: This is Scholar DAO
Header.paragraph: We make the scientific peer reviewing system trustless, verifiable and most of all less f*cked up

About.paragraph: Operating on the Ethereum Blockchain, we provide an incentive system that allows any researcher to get their paper reviewed and published.

Features.title: TRUSTLESS
Features.text: All our reviews and validators are anonymous and our incentive system is crafted to publish honest research.

Features.title: DECENTRALIZED
Features.text: As a DAO, we cant mutate the results of any paper. No central authority except code governs the protocol

Features.title: DIRECTED EXPERTISE
Features.text: Expertise in very specific domains is available to all researchers.

Features.title: NO MORE PRESTIGE
Features.text: Through our protocol, we remove the need for prestige and social standing to get accurate reviews
